A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a good use of Mark Hamil (Luke)\,  he is the one. Although great to see him as Luke again\, there is so much more they could of done\, instead we get wish wash story with a spoiled brat as the antagonist. The good movies are defined by a good villain here you just don't have one. At least the prequels had Darth maul their saving grace and a duel between obiwan and Anakin(Darth Vader). For me Star Wars ended at \"Return of the Jedi\" Luke saved the universe and lives on!
